resources.string: You went with a friend to the theater to watch a Super Hero movie, and shared pop corn.
It was so hot after the game! You had to have an ice-cream.
It was your best friend birthday. You still managed to find a not too expensive gift.
Although you went out with friends, you were cautious to only spend on a soft drink.
You bet with your friend that you will beat him, but you lost.
You went to visit your friend by bus. Luckily, your parents picked you up from there.
You had to repair your bicycle to tour with your buddies. Luckily parents shared the cost.
All your friends have this trendy T-shirt, and you just couldn’t resist buying it too.
One or more of your bank deposits ended today. You received cash and interest.
Roll dice to select the daily activity
Today the market had some losses.
Today the market did not change value.
Today the market had some gain.
Today the market is on a bull day.
The current value of one share is %1$s
Your uncle offers you to babysit his 4 year old daughter for one evening.
Your neighbor has no time today to walk his dog. You do it for him.
Your friend is afraid to wash his dog. You offer to do it for him.
You mow the lawn for your neighbor.
It’s autumn. Dead leaves are everywhere in your garden. You helped dad removing them and he decided to reward you.
Your young neighbor’s son is weak in math. You offer to help him.
Mam promised to reward you if you pass the vacuum cleaner in the whole house.
Your older brother usually distributes flyers in the neighborhood. This time he got lazy and has money, so…
Your neighbors are moving to another neighborhood. They need help packing
While the neighbor is on vacation abroad for a week, you water his plants on hot days.
%1$s: You do not have sufficient money to pay for your activities.
You are eliminated from the game.
You prepare lemonade and build a lemonade stand.
You catch insects and open a mini insectarium in your parents garage.
Together with your friend you learn a famous theater play. You do a representation in your parent’s garage.
You write a short novel and sell it on Amazon.
You design a custom card game and sell a few of them to your acquaintances.
This activity will end in %1$s days
Currently busy in an entrepreneur activity
The activity was not successful this time. Maybe better luck next time.
The activity obtained medium success this time.
It was a major success. Everybody was impressed.
You acquired a medal for this activity.
It will help you earn more next time you perform the same activity.
You have one Medal for Entrepreneur Activity %1$s.
You have %1$s Medals for Entrepreneur Activity %2$s.
To stay in the game, you have to sell some of your assets.
You need to sell more shares or withdraw more deposits.
%1$s is the only player to reach the end.
You can continue playing the game without time limit.
